Articles.Content:
Hello I am a semi-veteran to KSP. I got it... June, two years ago. I understand the basics of the game, rockets and planes. I mostly enjoy making Planes though, with BDarmory,B9,Firespitter and a few other mods. I have used this site before, but never bothered to make an account. I am looking forward to working with the forum community!

Edited December 2, 2014 by Specialist290
Nothing to see here.
Welcome to the forums! Feel free to make yourself at home. Have any tales of any particular accomplishments you enjoyed achieving, or any favorite craft you might want to share?
